revised_title: Isaac Newton's Shorthand and Religious Examination in 1662
tldr: In 1662, Isaac Newton explored the use of shorthand as a way to examine his moral life and record his sins. This period of intense religious awareness led him to confess his actions and thoughts, providing a glimpse into his young, unsophisticated puritan mindset. Newton's use of shorthand also allowed him to practice self-examination and conceal thoughts he wished to keep private.
